movie.title: Arcane
movie.summary: Arcane is an animated series based on the video game League of Legends, exploring the rivalry between two cities, Piltover and Zaun, and the origins of its iconic champions.

movie.title: Dragon's Blood
movie.summary: Dragon's Blood follows a dragon knight, Davion, as he embarks on a quest to rid the world of dragons, only to discover a deeper conspiracy.

movie.title: Delicious in Dungeon
movie.summary: In this series, adventurers journey through dungeons while cooking and eating monsters to survive, turning the gruesome into gourmet meals.

movie.title: Dragon Prince
movie.summary: Dragon Prince is an animated series that follows the journey of two princes, their allies, and a dragon egg, aiming to unite their warring lands.

movie.title: Tomb Raider: The Legend of Lara Croft
movie.summary: Lara Croft embarks on an adventure in this animated film, facing deadly traps and powerful enemies while seeking the legendary Scion.

movie.title: The Witcher
movie.summary: The Witcher is a series following Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter who faces political intrigue, magical creatures, and moral dilemmas in a fantasy world.

movie.title: The Watchmen
movie.summary: In an alternate history where superheroes emerged in the 1940s and 1960s, a group of vigilante heroes uncover a conspiracy that threatens the world.

movie.title: His Dark Materials
movie.summary: Based on Philip Pullman's trilogy, His Dark Materials follows young Lyra as she embarks on an epic journey to uncover the secrets of parallel worlds.

movie.title: Carnival Row
movie.summary: In a Victorian fantasy world, a human detective and a refugee faerie rekindle a dangerous affair while investigating a series of gruesome murders.

movie.title: Good Omens
movie.summary: An angel and a demon form an unlikely partnership to stop Armageddon after discovering that their respective employers are unwittingly bringing about the apocalypse.

movie.title: Forever
movie.summary: A married couple in a small town faces a strange occurrence that may have a lasting impact on their lives as they are challenged by deep secrets.

movie.title: Brynhildr in the Darkness
movie.summary: Ryouta Murakami, a student who lost his friend years ago, meets a mysterious girl who might hold the secret to his lost memories.

movie.title: Deadman Wonderland
movie.summary: Ganta Igarashi is falsely accused of a crime he didn’t commit and sent to a brutal prison where inmates are forced to participate in deadly games for survival.
